message: Let's get started! Take 2000, I'll take 8000. You can't do better than this!
I'll start with a balanced offer, but I'm willing to negotiate. Take it or leave it!
You're not getting the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but don't expect more!
I'm starting to get a bit more aggressive. You're getting less and less with each round, Alice!
Time to get serious, Bob. 50/50 is as fair as it gets. Take it or leave it!
